shortDescription: Conditional Access location condition is moving up.
title: Conditional Access location condition is moving up
description:
Starting mid-April 2024, the Conditional Access ‘Locations’ condition is moving up. Locations will become the 'Network' assignment, with the new Global Secure Access assignment - 'All compliant network locations'. This change will occur automatically, admins won’t need to take any action. 
 
 More details: 
 
 - The familiar ‘Locations’ condition is unchanged, updating the policy in the ‘Locations’ condition will be reflected in the ‘Network’ assignment and vice versa. 
 - No functionality changes, existing policies will continue to work without changes.
